verses.content: Chun, Israel thla pungkhâwm- hai po po chu thla khatnaa chun Zin thlalêrah an lût a; chun, mipuihai chun Kadesa chun umhmun an khuor a; chutaka chun Miriam chu a thih a, chutaka chun an phûm tah a.
Pungkhâwmhai chun tui an nei ta nawh a. Mosie le Aron chungchâng thuah an inhâwrkhâwm ngiel a.
Chun, mipui chun, “LALPA hmaa ei unauhai an thi lai khan Pathienin mi lo sukhlum ve thên lem ta sien aw!
Iengdinga LALPA mipui hi thi dinga thlalêra hin ṭhuoi lût am i nih a, keini le kan ranhai le hin?

Iengdinga hi ram ṭha nawtaka mi ṭhuoi lût dingin Aigupta rama in- thawka mîn suoktir am i na? Thlai chi dâm, theichanghai, grêphruihai, thei- bufaihai umna ram ni lo hi; tui dâwn ding hrim hrim hlak um lo” tiin Mosie chu an suosal tah a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu mipui- hai laia inthawk chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun an va feh a; an bawkkhup a;
chun, LALPA ropuina an kuomah a hung inlang a.

Chuongchun, LALPAIN Mosie chu, “Hmawl la la, pungkhâwmhai chu inumkhâwmtir la, nang le i unau Aron leh, an mithmuah lungpui chu a tui suksuok dingin hril la, lungpuia inthawk chun tui la suokpêk i ta; chuongchun, pungkhâwmhai le an ranhai chu în dâwntir ding annâwm,” tiin a biek a.
Mosie chun LALPA hmaa in- thawk chun hmawl chu a thupêk ang chun a lâk a.
Mosie le Aron chun pung- khâwmhai chu lungpui bula chun an inumkhâwmtir a, an kuomah, “Mi hel hmanghai, ngai ta u, hi lungpuia inthawk hin tui kan lâk suokpêk ding cheu am a nih?” an ta.
Mosie chun a bân a phar a, lungpui chu a hmawl chun vawi hni a hang vuok a; chuongchun, tui a hung suok ta zur zur el a, pungkhâwmhai le an ranhai chun an dâwn tah a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie le Aron kuomah, “In mi ring nawh a, Israel thlahai mithmua in mi chawimawi naw leiin, hieng pungkhâwmhai hi ka pêk rama chun ṭhuoi naw ti niu.
Hi hi Meriba tuihai chu a nih; chutaka chun Israel thlahai chu LALPA chungah an chier rak a, ama chun a thienghlimzie a suklang tâk leiin,” a ta.
Mosie chun Kadesa inthawk chun Edom lal kuomah mi a tir a, “I unaupa Israel chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Kan chunga tuorna hung tlung po po hi i hriet a;
kan pi le puhai Aigupta ramah an fe thlah a, sâwttak el Aigupta rama kan um dâm, Aigupta mi- haiin kan pi le puhai le keini ngei khawm ṭha nawtaka an mi thawzie dâm kha.
Chuongchun, LALPA kan ko a, kan râwl chu a lo hriet a, vântirko a hung tir a, Aigupta rama inthawkin a mi ṭhuoi suok a; chun, ngai ta, i ram dep tak Kadesa hin kan um a.

Lunginsiettakin i ram hi fe thleng kan tih; lo amanih, grêp huon amanihah fe naw ning unga a, tuisunsuo tuihai dâwn bawk naw ning ung; lal lamlienah fe pei kan ta, i ram kan khêl hmakhat chun chang- tieng amanih, vawitieng amanih khawm pêt naw ning ungah,’ tiin,” a ta.
Edom ruok chun a kuomah, “In mi pal thleng ding a ni nawh, in mi pal vai chun a thaw ding chein kâwl- hnâm leh hung inthawk ka tih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun a kuomah, “Lamlienah hang fêng kan ta, chun, keini le kan ranin i tui kan dâwn chun a man chu pêng kan ti che; thil dang iengkhawm thaw loin a fein fethleng ringawt kan tih,” an ta.
Ama chun, “Fethleng lo ding,” a ta. Chun, Edom chu mipui tamtak leh mi hrâttakhai leh anni thaw ding chun a hung suok tah a,
an fe chu a phal ta nawh a, chuongchun, Israel mihai chun an kîrsan nâwk tah a.
Chuongchun, Kadesa inthawk chun an suok a, Israel thla mipui po pohai chun Hor tlâng an va tlung a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie le Aron chu Edom ram dep Hor tlânga chun a biek a, “Aron chu a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoi nîng a tih;
Meriba tuia dâm khan ka thu kalin in hel lei khan Israel thlahai ka pêk rama chun a lût naw ding a nih.
Aron le a naupa Eleazar chu Hor tlângah hung ṭhuoi rawh:
Aron chu a silfênhai hlîppêk la, a naupa Eleazar chu insiltir rawh: Aron chu a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoi nîng a ta, chutaka chun thîng a tih,” tiin.
Mosie chun LALPA thupêk ang chun a thaw a, mipui po pohai mit- hmuin Hor tlânga chun an hang fe a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Aron chu a silfênhai a hlîppek a, Eleazar ân siltir a, chun, Aron chu tlâng sîpa chun a thi tah a; chun, Mosie le Eleazar chu tlânga inthawk chun an hung thla a.
Chun, mipui po poin Aron a thi ti an hriet chun Israel mihai po po chun ni sâwmthum an sûn a.
